items.title: Where the most chaos could be lurking on Rivalry Week
items.description: With so many postseason questions, college football's best weekend promises to be better than ever.

items.title: Projecting the College Football Playoff top 12 after Week 13
items.description: We assess how the committee could stack the top teams in the country.

items.title: Dan Morgan's journey from $35M player to $35K scout -- and now Panthers GM
items.description: Only two of the 32 GMs played in the league -- and they took drastically different paths to get there.

items.title: How Christian McCaffrey became a scrimmage yard king on the verge of NFL history
items.description: McCaffrey, one of the best receiving running backs in NFL history, plays his former team on "Monday Night Football."

items.title: Tucker to get Saints tryout, 1st since suspension
items.description: The Saints are bringing in former Ravens kicker Justin Tucker for a tryout, coach Kellen Moore confirmed.
